tool_description: Analyzes correlations between review metrics (ratings, sentiment, volume) and sales performance to identify relationships and impact patterns.

sentiment_scores.description: Time series of average sentiment scores

sales_data.description: Time series of sales figures (revenue or units)

lag_periods.description: Number of periods to test for lagged correlations

correlation_threshold.description: Minimum correlation coefficient to report as significant

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: All time series arrays must have the same length.
Insufficient data points: At least 5 data points required for meaningful correlation analysis.
Invalid correlation threshold: Threshold must be between 0 and 1.
Invalid lag periods: Lag periods must be non-negative integers and less than half the data series length.
usage: Provide time series arrays for ratings, volumes, sentiment, sales, and conversions. Optionally configure lag_periods and correlation_threshold for advanced analysis.

rating_sales_correlation.description: Correlation coefficient between ratings and sales

sentiment_conversion_correlation.description: Correlation coefficient between sentiment and conversion rates

volume_sales_correlation.description: Correlation coefficient between review volume and sales

strongest_correlation.description: Description of the strongest correlation found
